title: The Subtle Art of Not Giving a F*ck | Official Trailer
description:
I made a feature film. It has me and pandas and uses the word "f*ck" a lot.

You might like it.

Follow https://instagram.com/subtleartmovie for updates from Universal about theaters, cities, dates, and other fancy stuff. Because they definitely give a f*ck.

#SubtleArtMovie 
www.subtleartmovie.com

-

Sign up for my newsletter to receive three actionable pieces of advice each week that could change your life - free sign up here: http://bit.ly/3JRg3NX

If you are not already a member of my premium membership, get access to my courses and exclusive writing here: http://bit.ly/3LwHWfi

I am Mark Manson, 3x #1 NY Times bestselling author of:

The Subtle Art of Not Giving a F*ck - https://mrk.mn/3svfxcu
Everything Is F*cked: A Book About Hope - https://mrk.mn/2RNxVAD

I share other types of content to make you a less awful human in these places:

https://instagram.com/markmanson/
https://twitter.com/IAmMarkManson
https://facebook.com/Markmansonnet/
https://linkedin.com/in/markmanson/
https://www.tiktok.com/@iammarkmanson

Thanks for watching.
caption: true

channel_info.title: Mark Manson
channel_info.description: 3x #1 NY Times Bestselling Author. World Champion Non-Fuck-Giver.

transcription: You You're going to die one day, I just wanted to remind you This is me Mark Manson, and I wrote a book It's about self-esteem You deserve to be special and unique and extraordinary Actually, that's bullshit I It's about positivity You go on social media and you feel like a loser The message is that a better life is about more more more Making a lot of money might make you feel good, but it won't make your kids. Love you Our brain is kind of playing this game with us To give a fuck about everything nicer job low-fat milk SPF and ozone social media Then we'll live happily ever after There's only a few things in life that are ever worth giving a fuck about It'd be a hell of a lot easier if I could just hit you with six easy steps to life success But to really get into this stuff, you've got to feel it and the feeling I Guess I'm gonna have to dig up some old painful shit
